text: The 1978/79 NTFL season was the 58th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won there 10th premiership title while defeating the Nightcliff Tigers in the grand final by 31 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St Marys | 17.15 (117) - 13.8 (86) | Nightcliff |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1978/79 NTFL season
